settings.text:
<!--  -->
Checklist:  
Mac:  
  [ ] Close any unnecessary apps  
  [ ] Turn off wifi; use dock's wired network  
  [ ] Launch OBS  
  [ ] Launch Chrome Canary to LocalWebAudioPlayer; Play: Loop & Random  
  [ ] Launch Discord; set user to NvK, join voice channel, mute N & K  
  [ ] Turn on OBSBOT and confirm video  
N&K:  
  [ ] Set common keyboard to sync mode  
  [ ] Start NvK-Agent  
  [ ] Wiggle mouse on each PC and confirm OBS scene auto-change  
      (May need to verify Mac WebSocket IP address.)  
  [ ] Launch Discord, set user to N or K, join voice channel and mute it  
  [ ] Start SC  
Stream:  
  [ ] Mic Check; levels move on N & K scenes  
      (Check mic not muted)  
  [ ] Uncheck/Disable N & K NvK-Agent OBS WebSocket Server  
  [ ] Set Scene "Starting Soon"  
  [ ] Start & **Verify YouTube shows Live has started**  
  [ ] Verify YouTube "Live Chat Replay" is enabled  
  [ ] Set Scene N or K  
  [ ] Check/Enable N & K NvK-Agent OBS WebSocket Server  

Followup:  
SocialStream chat to YouTube does not work?  
New lowered audio levels better?  

ECHO NOTES:  
KNIGHT (or NIGHT) must have their *LOCAL* Mic capture muted  
   (Filter will continue to output to NDI)  
MACBOOK Discord must locally mute KNIGHT and NIGHT  

Sound Notes:  
When I talk, set Game to 40%, Discord to 20%, Music to 10%.  
When Discord talks, set Game to 40%, Music to 10%.  
Otherwise, set Game to X%, Discord to 100%, Music to 40%.  
X = Current scene Primary 100%, Secondary 60%  

TODO:  
obs-multi-rtmp start delay [for my YouTube]
